overview: If Mike doesn't motivate his team to reach their targets, it could be the end of the line for their sales division. Rob, a keen new employee, is at the centre of this dysfunctional family, as he explores various styles of working (or lack of!)
tagline: If Mike doesn't motivate his team to reach their targets, it could be the end of the line for their sales division. Rob, a keen new employee, is at the centre of this dysfunctional family, as he explores various styles of working (or lack of!)
title: Non Starter Leader
